name: WooCommerce Product Description
author: rohilmistry

sections.description:
WooCommerce Product Description will show product description in tooltip when user hover on product image so that user don’t have to go in to detail page to see desciption.

Steps to make it work

  • Simply install the plugin.
  • And It’s Done. ðŸ™‚

More features are available in Premium Plugin

  • Change position of tooltip
  • Change color of tooltip
  • Change theme of tooltip

We always welcome your suggestion and We are always there to support you.

INITIAL RELEASE
sections.installation:
Follow steps described below to install that plugin:

e.g.

  1. Download zip file from the wordpress plugin page.
  2. Upload that file to your wordpress site
  3. Activate it.
  4. Bingo. That is it.
sections.faq:
Why tooltip is not working?

Post your question in support and We will help you to make it work.

short_description: An add-on for WooCommerce to show Product Description in shop page on hover.
